stages.title: Don't Be Afraid
stages.message: Monsters aren't real. They're just stories we tell ourselves when we're scared.

stages.title: Face Your Fears
stages.message: Sometimes scary things help us grow stronger and more brave.

stages.title: Being Brave
stages.message: Being brave means facing your fears, even when you're trembling inside.

stages.title: You're Stronger
stages.message: You're stronger than you think. Every fear you face makes you stronger.
